meta.title: Serhiy Prytula Foundation Training Center | Interceptor Crew Training
meta.description: Professional training for UAV interceptor crews. Certified center. 83% kill rate. Free for Armed Forces of Ukraine.

hero.subtitle: Saving lives of military personnel by training highly professional crews of UAV operators — aerial target interceptors.

about.label: About us
about.title: About Training Center
about.paragraph1: Serhiy Prytula Charitable Foundation established the Training Center. For years, the Foundation has been supporting the saturation of Ukraine's Security and Defense Forces with innovative equipment, as well as providing personnel training.
about.paragraph2: We don't just purchase drones for the army — we invest in professional crew training to ensure high efficiency of technology application. An untrained crew cannot realize the potential of the equipment they use.
about.paragraph3: Our professional team of 8 instructors pours their heart into every cadet. Former military personnel and civilian professionals work together to ensure the quality of the training process.

ecosystem.title: Certified Center
ecosystem.description: Certified per Resolution №1129. Member of the UAV Schools Association. Cooperation with the Gunsmiths Association.

full-cycle.title: Full Cycle
full-cycle.description: 10 days of training: theory, demonstration, 18 hours of simulator, 24 hours of flight practice. No more than 3 cadets per instructor.

expertise.title: Transparency & Trust
expertise.description: Every invoice, receipt, act, spreadsheet — fully open to our partners.

results.title: Proven Effectiveness
results.description: 83% kill rate. 1 UAH spent destroys 52 UAH of enemy assets.

military_units.title: Training in 2 UAV directions
military_units.subtitle: Team of 8 instructors. Own training ground with up to 4 crews in the air simultaneously. No more than 3 cadets per 1 instructor.

registration.title: Register for a Course
registration.subtitle: Fill out the form and our team will contact you within 24 hours

modal.title: Course Registration
modal.placeholder: Google Form will be embedded here

donate.title: Support Training Center
donate.description: Your support helps train professional military personnel and provide them with the best equipment.

partnerships.label: Cooperation
partnerships.title: Partnership
partnerships.description: Every invoice, receipt, act, spreadsheet — fully open to our partners. Quality training is not cheap. But every downed enemy UAV is a strongpoint that won't be hit by a guided bomb.

impact.title: Real Impact
impact.description: 1 UAH spent destroys 52 UAH of enemy assets. Every downed UAV saves lives.

transparency.title: Full Transparency
transparency.description: Every invoice, receipt, act, spreadsheet — fully open to our partners with regular updates.

recognition.title: Recognition
recognition.description: Public recognition of your contribution and PR activity opportunities

footer.tagline: Saving lives of military personnel by training highly professional crews.
